fields.value: 2018 Geographical Infrastructure for the City of Boston

dsDescriptionValue.value: The Boston Area Research Initiative’s Geographical Infrastructure for the City of Boston is a database that organizes and links the places and regions of Boston, MA across various geographic levels—including land parcels, streets, census geographies, and other administrative regions. The levels are organized in a hierarchy, with the items in each level nested in the higher-level regions that contain it (e.g., land parcels in census geographies). This is coordinated via variables that act as unique identifiers at each level. As a composite, the database is intended to facilitate aggregate calculations across levels of the hierarchy and analyses of data from different sources that reference the same geographical units. In particular, the database makes it possible to connect data sets generated by the City of Boston with census geographies and data.

files.description: This documentation file details pertinent information associated with all of the files and content within the 2018 Geographical Infrastructure for the City of Boston dataset. This file also details information for the contents of the "2010 Census Geographies" and "Administrative Geographies for the City of Boston" datasets.
files.label: 2018 Geographical Infrastructure Documentation.pdf

dataFile.description: This documentation file details pertinent information associated with all of the files and content within the 2018 Geographical Infrastructure for the City of Boston dataset. This file also details information for the contents of the "2010 Census Geographies" and "Administrative Geographies for the City of Boston" datasets.

files.description: This file contains the geometric distance between block groups (in meters), or “as the crow flies”. It is part of the travel adjacency matrix where seven different measures were calculated between census block groups and census tracts. See documentation file for more details.
files.label: bgs_crow.flies.csv

files.description: Prior to the 2016 Geographic Infrastructure for the City of Boston, BARI used the city's Master Address List as the fundamental file for connecting lower and higher level geographies. This file acts as conversion file for any City of Boston file that uses "Property_ID" as the primary unit of analysis.
files.label: IDConnector.2018.tab

dataFile.description: Prior to the 2016 Geographic Infrastructure for the City of Boston, BARI used the city's Master Address List as the fundamental file for connecting lower and higher level geographies. This file acts as conversion file for any City of Boston file that uses "Property_ID" as the primary unit of analysis.

files.description: This file contains all of the intersections generated by the U.S. Census TIGER line roads data from 2013. For more information, refer to the documentation.
files.label: Intersections_(Census) 2013 BARI CSV.tab

dataFile.description: This file contains all of the intersections generated by the U.S. Census TIGER line roads data from 2013. For more information, refer to the documentation.

files.description: This zipped file contains the various shapefile files of the 2013 TIGER line roads data's intersections.
files.label: Intersections_(Census).zip

dataFile.description: This zipped file contains the various shapefile files of the 2013 TIGER line roads data's intersections.

files.description: This file merges the City of Boston's master list of intersections with the U.S. Census Bureau's TIGER line road map file. For more information, refer to the documentation.
files.label: Intersections_(City) 2013 BARI CSV.tab

dataFile.description: This file merges the City of Boston's master list of intersections with the U.S. Census Bureau's TIGER line road map file. For more information, refer to the documentation.

files.description: This zipped file contains the various shapefile files of the City of Boston's intersections.
files.label: Intersections_(City).zip

dataFile.description: This zipped file contains the various shapefile files of the City of Boston's intersections.

files.description: This file contains information on the 97,852 unique super-ordinate land parcels accounted for in the 2018 Property Assessment Dataset updated annually by the City of Boston. It details various attributes maintained by the original data and some new variables created by BARI. It also includes each land parcel's relation to larger city and census geographies.
files.label: Land.Parcels.2018.csv

dataFile.description: This file contains information on the 97,852 unique super-ordinate land parcels accounted for in the 2018 Property Assessment Dataset updated annually by the City of Boston. It details various attributes maintained by the original data and some new variables created by BARI. It also includes each land parcel's relation to larger city and census geographies.

files.description: This zipped file contains the various shapefile files for the City of Boston's 2018 Land Parcels. It has both attributes from the City of Boston and BARI.
files.label: Parcels2018_BARI.zip

dataFile.description: This zipped file contains the various shapefile files for the City of Boston's 2018 Land Parcels. It has both attributes from the City of Boston and BARI.

files.description: This file contains population weighted centroids of nested census blocks within census block groups and census tracts. These centroids represent a more accurate central location of where populations are living within various census geographies (rather than the geometric center of census polygons).
files.label: pop.centroids.csv

dataFile.description: This file contains population weighted centroids of nested census blocks within census block groups and census tracts. These centroids represent a more accurate central location of where populations are living within various census geographies (rather than the geometric center of census polygons).

files.description: This file contains information on the 170,096 properties accounted for in the 2018 Property Assessment Dataset updated annually by the City of Boston. It details the parcel-specific address, ownership information, and land use type for individual properties. It also includes each property's relation to larger city and census geographies.
files.label: Properties.2018.csv

dataFile.description: This file contains information on the 170,096 properties accounted for in the 2018 Property Assessment Dataset updated annually by the City of Boston. It details the parcel-specific address, ownership information, and land use type for individual properties. It also includes each property's relation to larger city and census geographies.

files.description: This file contains a complete list of all 24,891 road segments within the City of Boston. It is derived from the 2013 TIGER Line dataset maintained by the U.S. Census Bureau. It also includes each road segment's relation to larger census geographies.
files.label: Roads.2018.csv

dataFile.description: This file contains a complete list of all 24,891 road segments within the City of Boston. It is derived from the 2013 TIGER Line dataset maintained by the U.S. Census Bureau. It also includes each road segment's relation to larger census geographies.

files.description: This file contains the edge list of streets in Boston that intersect with each other. See documentation file for more details.
files.label: streets.intersections.el.csv

dataFile.description: This file contains the edge list of streets in Boston that intersect with each other. See documentation file for more details.
